bibl.title: On the Sureties of Tax Contractors in Ptolemaic Egypt.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Kaimio, Maarit

bibl.note: P. Hels. Inv. 21. Report in the "hypomnema" form supplied by the tax contractor to the "oikonomos" Alexandros. Heracleopolis, October 15, 159 B.C. Inv. 37 is written in identical formulas. - Inv. 22. Official register. Heracleopolis, 159 B.C.
bibl.seg: Kaimio Maarit, On the Sureties of Tax Contractors in Ptolemaic Egypt.
